title: FamilyMart Conbini Enamel Camping Mug
description:
The FamilyMart Conbini Enamel Camping Mug is a tribute to Japan’s beloved convenience store, where quick coffee runs, late-night snacks, and refreshing drinks fuel everyday life. Whether you’re starting your morning with a hot drink, reminiscing about your favorite Famichiki run, or enjoying an outdoor adventure, this mug brings the comfort and nostalgia of FamilyMart wherever you go.

🏪 Why You'll Love It:
✔ Authentic Conbini Aesthetic – Inspired by FamilyMart’s signature blue, green, and white colors, this mug embodies the cozy, familiar charm of Japan’s conbini culture.
✔ Durable & Lightweight – Made from high-quality enamel-coated stainless steel, perfect for both indoor use and outdoor adventures.
✔ Perfect for Any Beverage – Whether it’s hot coffee, tea, or even instant noodles on the go, this mug is designed for convenience—just like your favorite conbini.
✔ Travel-Friendly – Lightweight and compact, making it an ideal companion for camping, road trips, and city explorations.
✔ Lead & BPA-Free – Safe, sturdy, and built for daily use.
✔ Vintage-Inspired Design – The classic enamel look adds a touch of retro charm to your drinkware collection.

⚠️ Important Notes:

Capacity: 12oz (0.35L) – just the right size for your favorite drinks.
No Microwave Use – Made of metal, so keep it out of the microwave.
Rounded Corners for Comfort – Smooth edges for easy sipping.
✨ Whether you're camping under the stars, reminiscing about late-night conbini snacks, or starting your morning with a taste of Japan, this mug is a must-have for every FamilyMart fan.

🛍️ Limited Edition – Get Yours Now! 🚀
